mapper.select: select MENU_ID,PARENT_ID,NAME,URL,PERMS,TYPE,ICON,ORDER_NUM from sys_menu where parent_id = #{parentId} order by order_num asc
select MENU_ID,PARENT_ID,NAME,URL,PERMS,TYPE,ICON,ORDER_NUM from sys_menu where type != 2 order by order_num asc

select MENU_ID,PARENT_ID,NAME,URL,PERMS,TYPE,ICON,ORDER_NUM from SYS_MENU
and MENU_ID in (select distinct rm.menu_id from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and type in ('0','1')
order by order_num asc
